description: An advanced student of the mystic arts and fellow pupil of The Ancient One, Mordo saw the potential in the fledgling apprentice Stephen Strange and took him under his wing when the one-time neurosurgeon first sought healing. Like Strange, Mordo came to Kamar-Taj lost and broken. The Ancient One helped channel Mordo’s anger and led him down the path to enlightenment. While Mordo sees a bit of himself in Strange, his reason for vetting him is much shrewder – in the fight against unknowable darkness, Kamar-Taj needs all the help it can muster.

sections.name: Astral Form – Always Active
sections.description:
Mordo is Immune to Passive Ability Accuracy reductions.

While the opponent has at least 1 Buff, gain +460.2 Attack Rating.

Every 8 seconds, Mordo gains a Power Gain Buff, granting 1 Bar of Power over 5 seconds. This Buff is removed if Mordo is struck. If fighting as a Defender, Mordo will behave less aggressively while this Buff is active.
sections.note: The +20% Attack Rating while the opponent has a Buff is new to Mordo’s kit. It originally existed as a unique synergy bonus effect from Symbiote Supreme.

sections.name: While Stunned
sections.description:
Mordo will Evade any incoming Basic Attack and perform a counter-attack which has a 100% chance to inflict a Degeneration Debuff, causing 1840.8 direct damage over 2.5 seconds.

Mordo cannot Evade or counter-attack while suffering from a Concussion or Fatigue Debuff.

sections.name: Blocking
sections.description: If Mordo holds Block for more than 0.5 seconds, his Block will not be broken by Unblockable Special Attacks.

1.name: Energy Blast
1.description:
30% chance to inflict a 3 second Stun Debuff.

100% chance to inflict a Degeneration Debuff, causing 1840.8 Direct Damage over 2.5 seconds. If the opponent has at least 1 Buff, this effect can be triggered through a Block.

2.description: 100% chance to inflict a Soul Barb Debuff lasting 14 seconds, dealing 276.12 Energy Damage per second for each Buff on the opponent. Soul Barb also reduces Regeneration Rate by 80%.
2.name: Astral Strike
2.note: Soul Barb has received a slight buff, as it reduces Regeneration Rate by 80% instead of the old 70%.

3.description:
100% chance to gain 3 Fury Buffs, each granting +1150.5 Attack Rating for 17 seconds.

Up to 50% chance based on lost Health to gain a Regeneration Buff in place of a Fury Buff, recovering 4709.7 Health over 6 seconds.
3.name: Mirror Dimension
3.note: Two small boosts here. The duration of the Fury Buffs has been increased from 12 to 17 seconds. Additionally, the chance to gain a Regeneration Buff in place of a Fury has been increased from 40% to 50% based on lost health.

signature.name: Mystical Barrier
signature.description:
By conjuring a magical barrier, Mordo gains 18,954.3 Energy Resistance while he remains Blocking.

If the opponent strikes Mordo’s Block while they have a True-Type Buff, he has a 100% chance to Nullify that Buff and replace it with a Detonate Buff lasting 20 seconds. Detonate deals a burst of 1610.7 Energy Damage when it’s Nullified or Expires.
signature.note: The second part of his Signature Ability is brand new to Mordo. Anytime he blocks an opponent while they have a True-Type Buff (True Accuracy, True Strike, True Sense, Etc.) it’s going to get Nullified and replaced with a Detonate Buff. Detonate will deal a burst of damage to the opponent, while also counting as a Buff to increase the strength of Mordo’s Attack Rating and Soul Barb.

sections.name: While Charging a Heavy Attack
sections.description:
Continually gain Fury Buffs, each granting +460.2 Attack Rating for 17 seconds. Max: 15 Buffs. Exponentially gain more Buffs the longer the Heavy Attack is charged.

If Mordo is below 1 Bar of Power, he will Passively gain 0.5 Bars of Power per second.
sections.note: The max stacks of Fury have been increased from 10 to 15 in this update. Additionally, the duration of the Fury Buffs has been increased from 12 to 17 seconds.
